organisationConnections.description: Primary shipping partner for all vehicle deliveries to AutoMax
Preferred dealer status with exclusive access to pre-sale inspections
Cross-referral partnership for customers outside each others primary markets
Title processing services for AutoMax inventory

contacts.title: General Manager
contacts.notes: Key decision maker for luxury vehicle imports. Prefers BMW and Mercedes-Benz models. Very responsive to email communication.

contacts.title: Sales Director
contacts.notes: Experienced sales professional specializing in high-volume dealer relationships. Excellent at coordinating complex multi-vehicle shipments and logistics.

contacts.title: CEO
contacts.notes: CEO of Premium Motors with 20+ years in luxury automotive. Focus on European imports and high-end collector vehicles. Prefers phone calls for urgent matters.

contacts.title: Operations Manager
contacts.notes: Detail-oriented operations manager handling inventory and logistics. Expertise in commercial vehicle procurement and fleet management solutions.

contacts.title: Import Specialist
contacts.notes: International shipping expert with extensive knowledge of customs regulations and documentation. Handles complex multi-country vehicle imports efficiently.

contacts.title: Independent Dealer
contacts.notes: Independent dealer with a focus on affordable domestic vehicles. Strong relationships with auction houses and quick decision-making process.

contacts.title: Purchasing Manager
contacts.notes: Strategic purchasing manager focused on inventory optimization. Specializes in Japanese imports and hybrid vehicles for the Pacific Northwest market.

contacts.title: Solo Trader
contacts.notes: Independent vehicle trader specializing in vintage and classic cars. Excellent network of collectors and restoration specialists throughout the Southwest.
